EmailTemplate.name: NATACC Case Created Email
EmailTemplate.subject: <case reason>, Case #: <case number>
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Thank you for reaching out to request assistance from your {!Account.Account_Care_Manager__c} . We have created case {!Case.CaseNumber} regarding this issue, and either myself or another member of the National Accounts Team will contact you at our first opportunity.
Thank you, {!Case.OwnerFullName} National Accounts â€“ Accountant Care Specialist ProAdvisor Technical Support: 888-333-3451 Email: NATACC@Intuit.com
Please complete the survey if the opportunity presents itself. If you did not receive a survey but would like to provide feedback on my performance, please email my manager directly at Sean_Randall@Intuit.com
